name: 大卫·维加
introduction: David Vega is a Spanish actor based in the USA. He is from a beautiful town in Cantabria (Northern Spain). He has been acting for more than 20 years, and graduated from the Atlantic Acting School Evening Conservatory in 2013. He can do Russian, Italian, French and Spanish ... accents. He is known for the Amazon Prime TV show "Chosen Kin Origins", Cut To Black, Airplane vs Volcano, The Preppie Connection, You Have A Nice Flight, among other movies.
